articles.description: Big Canada finally broke out as a senior under first-year DC Alex Grinch and his new scheme.
articles.content: On Jan. 3 of 2015, the Oklahoma Sooners received a commitment from a young Canadian who appeared more than cut out to be the dominant defensive lineman the program had been lacking for so long. It took longer than expected for that potential to be fully reali… [+3142 chars]
